negociation-assembly.xp-gain: You won {{xp}} experience points for influencing the assembly.
negociation-assembly.conclusion-line-accept: We've reached a consensus. It might not be ideal, but we took a courageous decision today. We accept the diamond dogs proposal.
negociation-assembly.conclusion-line-reject: Alright, the debate is closed. We're rejecting the diamond dogs demands.
negociation-assembly.conclusion-line-war: Then it's settled. The diamond dogs are too big of a threat. Prepare yourselves. Soon, we'll chase them away.
negociation-assembly.step1-introduction: Today we'll discuss the issue of the diamond dogs living underground.
negociation-assembly.step2-introduction: They want us to give up scavenging in the undergrounds.
negociation-assembly.step3-introduction: They want to trade their gems against our supplies.
negociation-assembly.agreeable-debate-line-step1-resident: They did not shed blood. It's pleasantly unexpected, these days.
negociation-assembly.agreeable-debate-line-step2-resident: I don't care for enclosed space anyway.
negociation-assembly.skeptical-debate-line-step1-resident: They gave our folks back, but it almost went south.
negociation-assembly.skeptical-debate-line-step2-resident: Give them them a hoof, they'll take the whole leg.
negociation-assembly.skeptical-debate-line-step3-resident: I wonder if their gems are really so valuable…
negociation-assembly.angry-debate-line-step1-resident: Fuck them. They had no right to do that !
negociation-assembly.angry-debate-line-step3-resident: I do not negociate with terrorists !
negociation-assembly.angry-debate-line-step4-resident: Let's go show them what for !
negociation-assembly.agreeable-debate-line-step1-resident#1: They needed help with their wounded. There are worse ways to ask.
negociation-assembly.agreeable-debate-line-step3-resident#1: It sounds like a good opportunity !
negociation-assembly.skeptical-debate-line-step1-resident#1: It's not nice. But maybe they didn't see an alternative.
negociation-assembly.skeptical-debate-line-step2-resident#1: I don't want us to fight, but we might need what's in those tunnels as well.
negociation-assembly.skeptical-debate-line-step3-resident#1: It might be best to each keep to ourselve…
negociation-assembly.angry-debate-line-step1-resident#1: We can't trust people who think the end justifies the means !
negociation-assembly.angry-debate-line-step2-resident#1: They have no right to keep it all to themselves !
negociation-assembly.angry-debate-line-step3-resident#1: Trading with our future executioners ? No thanks !
negociation-assembly.agreeable-debate-line-step1-cook: They showed fangs, but it didn't end so bad.
negociation-assembly.agreeable-debate-line-step2-cook: There's enough for us in the junkyard anyway.
negociation-assembly.agreeable-debate-line-step3-cook: Better to trade than to fight.
negociation-assembly.skeptical-debate-line-step1-cook: They showed fangs once… maybe they'll use them.
negociation-assembly.skeptical-debate-line-step2-cook: It's not fair. We need the resources as well.
negociation-assembly.skeptical-debate-line-step3-cook: It'll just be a new ground for conflict…
negociation-assembly.angry-debate-line-step1-cook: They messed with my friends, I'll mess with them !
negociation-assembly.angry-debate-line-step2-cook: They want to keep us out ? I'd like to see them try !
negociation-assembly.angry-debate-line-step3-cook: I don't trade with feral beasts: I put them down !
negociation-assembly.angry-debate-line-step4-cook: I'll lead the fight against them !
negociation-assembly.agreeable-debate-line-step1-copain-dad: They could've killed. They didn't. It says something.
negociation-assembly.agreeable-debate-line-step2-copain-dad: That can work. The least we cross path, the better !
negociation-assembly.agreeable-debate-line-step3-copain-dad: We'll need some kind of agreement, but it can work.
negociation-assembly.skeptical-debate-line-step2-copain-dad: I'm not going to ask for their permission to scavenge around the tunnels !
negociation-assembly.skeptical-debate-line-step3-copain-dad: What happens when they need more than we can afford to sell ?
negociation-assembly.angry-debate-line-step1-copain-dad: Blackmailing us huh ? We'll show them !
negociation-assembly.angry-debate-line-step2-copain-dad: They don't want to share ? I say we take it all for ourselves !
negociation-assembly.angry-debate-line-step3-copain-dad: Fuck trading ! Let's chase them away !
negociation-assembly.agreeable-debate-line-step3-copain-mom: As long as we get a fair share of the gems !
negociation-assembly.skeptical-debate-line-step1-copain-mom: I don't understand why they took the scavengers…
negociation-assembly.skeptical-debate-line-step2-copain-mom: What happens if we need to get in the tunnels ?
negociation-assembly.skeptical-debate-line-step3-copain-mom: If we sit at the negociating table, we've already lost.
negociation-assembly.angry-debate-line-step1-copain-mom: I don't feel safe with them around.
negociation-assembly.angry-debate-line-step2-copain-mom: Do you think they would eat a foal ?
negociation-assembly.angry-debate-line-step3-copain-mom: Our children are not safe with them around !
negociation-assembly.agreeable-debate-line-step1-intendant: Trade is not aggression. They needed help, we provided.
negociation-assembly.agreeable-debate-line-step2-intendant: We get the junkyard, they get the tunnels. Sounds fair.
negociation-assembly.agreeable-debate-line-step3-intendant: Caravans want gems. We can turn in a huge profit.
negociation-assembly.skeptical-debate-line-step1-intendant: They might be pragmatic, but abducting is unacceptable.
negociation-assembly.skeptical-debate-line-step2-intendant: We can't prevent everypony from going down the tunnels.
negociation-assembly.skeptical-debate-line-step3-intendant: I have a hard time believing they have anything this valuable down below.
negociation-assembly.angry-debate-line-step1-intendant: They threatened us ! We can't trust them anymore.
negociation-assembly.angry-debate-line-step2-intendant: What do they have to hide ? Maybe we should go find out…
negociation-assembly.angry-debate-line-step3-intendant: Trade with enraged beasts, and all you'll get are bites !
negociation-assembly.agreeable-debate-line-step1-helpful-copa: For once something happened around here !
negociation-assembly.agreeable-debate-line-step2-helpful-copa: Alright, I guess I can stay away from the tunnels…
negociation-assembly.skeptical-debate-line-step1-helpful-copa: For once something happened around here !
negociation-assembly.skeptical-debate-line-step2-helpful-copa: But… we just found out about the tunnels ! I wanna explore them !
